main event: A civilian witnessed a UFO with four blinking yellow lights and two view slits in Greenville, New York on 2/23/98.
interesting points: The observer could see the object clearly for about 30 minutes,The object remained stationary during the observation,There were at least 3 to 4 other witnesses to the sighting,The object was described as being the size of a small plane,There was no physical evidence left by the object at the location.
sighted object: UFO with four blinking yellow lights and two view slits
